## Frisbee is a lickey pupper

```{r Read in data}
rm(list = ls())
library(tidyverse); library(lubridate); library(stringr)

# read in 2010-2017 California air quality data
pm25 <- read_csv("data/pm25_annual-days-above-nat-24-hr-stnd.csv", na = "*") %>% group_by(county) %>% summarize(pm2010 = mean(pm2010, na.rm = T), pm2011 = mean(pm2011, na.rm = T), pm2012 = mean(pm2012, na.rm = T), pm2013 = mean(pm2013, na.rm = T), pm2014 = mean(pm2014, na.rm = T), pm2015 = mean(pm2015, na.rm = T), pm2016 = mean(pm2016, na.rm = T), pm2017 = mean(pm2017, na.rm = T)) %>% gather(year, pm25, pm2010:pm2017) %>% mutate(year = str_sub(year, 3, 6)) %>% arrange(county)
head(pm25)

demo <- read_csv("data/age_edu_race.csv")[ , -1] %>% group_by(Geography, Year) %>% summarize(age60_perc = mean(age60_perc, na.rm = T), bachelor_perc = mean(bachelor_perc, na.rm = T), est.white.percent = mean(est.white.percent, na.rm = T), est.black.percent = mean(est.black.percent, na.rm = T)) %>% ungroup() %>% mutate(Geography = str_sub(Geography, 1, -20)) %>% rename(county = Geography, year = Year)
head(demo)
```
